de.ralleytn.simple.image

Class Atlas

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ralleytn.simple.image.Atlas

  • public final class Atlas
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an image atlas. Can be pretty helpful if you do something with animations, spritesheets, etc.
    Since:
    1.1.0
    Version:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    Ralph Niemitz/RalleYTN(ralph.niemitz@gmx.de)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static class  Atlas.Entry
      Represents an atlas entry.
